product_name: Eagle Creek Pack-It Specter Folder 15 - 2013 Closeout
long_description: An ultralight packing solution, the Eagle Creek Pack-It Specter Folder 15 weighs only 8 oz. yet holds up to 7 shirts. Translucent clothing folder allows you to see what's inside. Ultralight ripstop silnylon resists water and staining. 15-in. folder fits in a carry-on-size bag. Comes with a helpful folding instruction board. Eagle Creek Pack-It Specter Folder 15 minimizes wrinkles. Quick-grab handle. Closeout.
short_description: An ultralight packing solution, the Eagle Creek Pack-It Specter Folder 15 weighs only 8 oz. yet holds up to 7 shirts.
